Package com.grocery.ordering.repository

Class CustomerRepository

java.lang.Object
com.grocery.ordering.repository.CustomerRepository
@Repository public class CustomerRepository extends Object
Repository for Customer entity with JDBC implementation Implements SQL injection prevention using prepared statements
Author:
Chirag Singhal (chirag127)
